name: Life Insurance refers to a policy or cover whereby the policyholder can ensure financial freedom for his/her family members after death
Vehicle insurance refers to policies that offer financial assistance in the event of accidents involving your car or bike.

Any building or immovable structure can be insured through property insurance plans. This can be either your residence or commercial space. If any damage befalls such a property, you can claim financial assistance from the insurance provider.
When talking about the different types of insurance policies, one must not forget to learn more about travel insurance plans.
Health insurance refers to a type of general insurance, which provides financial assistance to policyholders when they are admitted to hospitals for treatment.
